Celeron decides it would be best to find out if he had the material to
repa=
ir the ship before he began to patch the hull.  He decided it
would be best=
 to fixt the big holes first, since they were greater
security risks than t=
he smaller ones that were not likely to permit
unauthorized entry.  He bega=
n searching around for spare metal that
may have fallen off of the ship and=
 stacked it up in the storage
room....
